p: The Union Territory of Puducherry/Pondicherry is in Southern India and lies at a latitude of 11°46′ to 12°30′ North and a longitude of 79°36′ to 79°52’ East. The territory lies on the Coromandel Coast of Bay of Bengal extending over 479 Sq. km. The total population is 12, 44, 464 (2011 census). It has a hot and humid climate with an average maximum temperature of 31.5 °C and average minimum temperature of 23.9 °C. March to July - summer, December to February-winter and September to December-monsoon.
